result.purpose: Provides common utilities and constants used throughout the application.
result.architecture: Modular architecture focusing on reusable components for common functionalities.

internal/commons/address.go.purpose: Converts a hexadecimal hash to a lowercase Ethereum address.

internal/commons/constant.go.purpose: Defines a set of constants used throughout the application.

internal/commons/date.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for date manipulation in UTC.
risks: Potential for incorrect date calculations if edge cases are not handled properly.
